Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Ate nuha de vala vahi kiti ga'i ki huna tuhadi kauma vicom ko'i imana nahim li'avega binham usa tom jihara imana li'a cuki'a isa la'i unham de karamam upara dukhi na hovo jihare uha kara rahe hana
Ate sade sahamane ate sade hukama nala tusim kisati bana'u ate zalimam de pakha vica mere nala gala na karom. Binham saka iha loka dubanage
Ate nuha kisati bana'una lagi'a. Jadom usa di kauma da ko'i saradara usa kaulom laghada tam uha usa da mazaka unda'unda. Usa ne athi'a ki
jaladi samajha lavauge ki uha kauna hana. `Jinha upara afata a'undi hai. Jihari usa nu be'izata kara deve ate uha tali na ja sake

Ithom taka ki jadom sada hukama a pahuci'a ate tuphana ubala pi'a tam asim nuha nu kiha, ki hara tar'ham de janavaram da ika ika jora vica rakha lai, ate apane ghara vali'am nu vi. Binham unham lokam tom jinham de sabadha vica pahilam kiha ja cuka hai, sare imana vali'am nu vi. Thorhe hi loka sana jihare nuha de nala imana li'a'e si
Ate nuha ne kiha ki kisati vica savara ho ja'u. Alaha de nama nala hi isa da calana ate thahirana hai. Besaka mera raba bakhasana ate rahimata vala hai

Ate kisati pahara jidi'am lahiram de vicakara unham nu lai ke calana lagi. Ate nuha ne apane bete nu bula'i'a, jo usa tom vakhara si. Ki he mere bete! Sade nala savara ho ja ate inakari'am de nala na rahi

Usa ne kiha ki maim' kise pahara di sarana lai lavanga jo mainu pani tom baca lavega. Nuha ne kiha, aja ko'i alaha de hukama tom baca'una vala nahim, sirafa uha hi (bacega) jisa upara alaha mihara kare. Ate dovam de vicakara lahiram a ga'i'am, ate uha dubana vali'am vica samila ho gi'a

Ate kiha gi'a ki he dharati! Apana pani nigala lai ate asamana thama ja. Pani suka dita gi'a. Ate mamale da phaisala ho gi'a ate kisati (judi) pahara nala ja lagi ate kahi dita gi'a ki dura ho zalimam di kauma
Nuha ne apane raba nu pukari'a ate kiha he mere palanahara! Mera putara maire ghara vali'am vicom hai, ate besaka tera va'ada saca hai ate tu sabha tom vada sasaka hai
Alaha ne kiha he nuha! Uha tere parivara vicom nahim. Usa de karama mare hana. Tam usa la'i savala na kara, jisa da tainu gi'ana nahim, maim tuhanu upadesa karada ham ki tu zahilam vicom na bana

Nuha ne akhi'a he mere palanahara! Maim teri sarana cahuda ham. Mai' tere tom uha ciza magi jisa da mainu gi'ana nahim je tu mainu mu'afa na kita ate mere ute rahimata na kiti tam maim barabada ho javanga

(Kiha gi'a ki he nuha! Sade valom surakhi'ata ate salamati nala utaro. Tuhade ate unham samuham upara jihare tuhade nala hana ate unham tom paida hona vale samuha) ki asim unham nu labha devange phira unham nu sade valom ika buri afata pakara lavegi
Iha gupata khabaram hana, jinham nu asim' tuhade vala bheja rahe ham, isa tom pahilam na tusim inham nu janade si na tuhadi kauma. Isa la'i dhiraja rakho akhari natija darana vali'am la'i hai
